Text: By the way, after activation and relaunch, you can safely update to the newest version. Unlike the other uploads here on TPB, the 'remove selected' actually works :)
therealtommyjay said it all! Fully updatable to version 1.4 and working perfectly on my MacBook Pro running 10.8.3. Many thanks bro!
Thanks so much. Worked perfectly. Very good program.
Works great, even with the new 1.4 update. Thanks! PS: Only one of the keygens worked for me - so for those having trouble, remember there are 2 keygens included - try the other one.
Be careful. I just had a previous version deactivate itself with a warning a cracked version was detected. It somehow managed to phone home, despite Little Snitch blocking it.
